items.content_html: I started tracking my runs on Strava since 2020. Covid had forced us to stay at home, gyms closed down but I still wanted to maintain my fitness. At some point during the pandemic, running outside seemed to be one of the safer things to do as it was outside, you’re still maintaining social distance, etc.
items.content_text: I started tracking my runs on [Strava](https://www.strava.com/athletes/21756504) since 2020. Covid had forced us to stay at home, gyms closed down but I still wanted to maintain my fitness. At some point during the pandemic, running outside seemed to be one of the _safer_ things to do as it was outside, you're still maintaining social distance, etc.

items.title: obsidian
items.content_html: I was recently introduced to obsidian.md for note taking and it’s slick. Favorite feature so far is the daily note.
